page.title: 05Boat Building-Galmpton Creek
page.content: There is an old established boat building business in Galmpton Creek. which used to specialise in building wooden fishing smacks for Brixham. They are used extensively now for boat repairs and storage with the occasional building of old fashioned wooden boats. The preserved Torbay and South Devon Railway runs through the middle of this area. There is a game bird farm in this area and it sends its birds all over the country to stock up the estates before they are shot. The square is covored with 6% housing, 16% arable, 73% rough grazing and 5% water which is the River Dart.
